texts.name: Azar
texts.biography: Abandoned with unicorns in AvLee when he was a child, he grew up as a druid until he joined Shayan's kingdom. Hell steeds and Nightmares remind him of unicorns he once knew.

specialty.name: Hell Steed
specialty.description:
{Hell Steed}

Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Hell Steed or Nightmare for each level attained after 5th level.
